entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story, a young wizard who lives at the headquarters of the anti-Voldemort movement.

entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: The main antagonist of the story, a dark wizard who is the leader of the opposing force to Harry's movement.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Harry's friend and companion, a young wizard who lives at the headquarters with Harry.

entities.name: hedwig
entities.description: Harry's owl, a magical creature that is used for communication and transportation.

entities.name: sirius
entities.description: A member of the Order of the Phoenix and Harry's godfather, who lives at the headquarters with Harry.

entities.name: order of the phoenix
entities.description: An anti-Voldemort movement that is led by Albus Dumbledore and has members such as Sirius Black and Remus Lupin.

relationships.description: Harry is the main character who opposes Voldemort, the main antagonist of the story.
Harry and Ron are friends and companions who live at the headquarters together.
Harry owns Hedwig, his owl that is used for communication and transportation.
Sirius is a member of the Order of the Phoenix, an anti-Voldemort movement that he is part of.
